Bus-Transportation-Management-System-main.tests.test_assigned_driver module

Author: Test Suite Unit tests for assigned driver functionality.

To run these tests:

python -m pytest tests/test_assigned_driver.py -v OR python tests/test_assigned_driver.py

tests.test_assigned_driver.test_get_all_assigned_drivers()[source]

Test retrieving all assigned drivers.

tests.test_assigned_driver.test_assign_driver_workflow()[source]

Test the complete workflow of assigning a driver.

tests.test_assigned_driver.test_assign_nonexistent_driver()[source]

Test assigning a driver that doesn’t exist.

tests.test_assigned_driver.test_assigned_driver_data_integrity()[source]

Test that assigned driver data is preserved correctly.
